programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie is investigated for the letter she transcribed for Bai Mu Lin who denies having anything to do with it. She is then offered the opportunity to confess her father's crimes, but she stands by her principles and refuses.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: The more Shi Qiang learns about Ye Wen Jie, the more suspicous he gets. Wang Miao re-enters the Three-Body game where everything has changed pointing to changes in civilization, but the goal of predicting the patterns of solar changes is the same.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Mu Xing decisively locks in on several key words said by Pan Han and believes there is a powerful organization behind him. Another scientist in Europe dies. Wang Miao asks Ye Wen Jie for advice again, and she calmly continues to tell him her story.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie discovers a potential fault while performing equipment maintenance. Her talents are noticed by General Director Lei Zhi Cheng and wants to transfer her to the core department of the Hong'an Project, but is strongly opposed by Yang Wei Ning.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Wang Miao plays a game with his daughter which inspires him to re-enter the Three-Body game with a new understanding of how to unlock the next level. Mu Xing once again boldly contacts Shen Yufei and decides it's time for her to make a choice.

programme.title: Fly with the Crane
programme.desc: 73 year old Ma and his good mate Cao are coffin makers, but ever since the Chinese government started to strongly promote cremation, fewer and fewer people come to the old men for coffins, therefore Ma spend his days hanging out with his grandchildren.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Ellen Eliasoph, a trailblazing Hollywood independent producer and long-time catalyst for China–U.S. film collaboration, unpacks the success of Nezha and explores China’s growing storytelling influence in global film markets.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Fuk Wor Triad member Ting and Senior Inspector Tuen of the Regional Anti Triad Unit are moles that have been planted by the rival party. After years undercover, both are eager to start new lives.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Despite living with Spinal Muscular Atrophy, Ben Lou transcends physical limitations through his extraordinary brilliance in mathematics and physics. He shares his inspiring journey, showcasing how resilience and intellect have turned adversity into a catalyst for groundbreaking innovation.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: On his way up north, Wang Lin is attacked by two assassins. Although he evades him this time, the Queen Mother has ordered for him to be killed within a month.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Zi Long is uncomfortable with the proposal of taking a concubine, but the Queen Mother emphasizes the importance of marriage to consolidate their position within the palace.

programme.title: Modern Dynasty
programme.desc: To prevent the Lungs and the Mas from becoming in-laws, Jin-hung exposes Chiu-chi’s indecent clip after his attempt to use Hau-ming to reveal Man-biu’s scandalous story failed, eventually causing Chiu-chi to break off her engagement.

programme.title: Modern Dynasty
programme.desc: Yan Sum agrees to work with De Rossi on the condition that Jin-hung stays with her.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie learns that the deleted files on her computer were restored shortly before Yang Dong committed suicide and realizes that was aware of her secret identity. Shi Qiang commands the arrest operation as Wang Miao attends the ETO meeting.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie proposed using the sun to amplify the radio tranmissions, but her idea is rejected. She secretly implemented it and finally on October 21, 1979, received a message from another world: a repeated warning of not to answer.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Jia Qi is jealous as she sees the way Dong Yu meticulously caring for Mandy. She brings Dong Yu to the music hall where they met for the first time and brings up old memories, expressing that she wants to start afresh with him. However, Dong Yu tells Jia Qi that he no longer has feelings for her. Jia Qi asks Dong Yu if he likes Mandy and he onfirms it. Jia Qi is disappointed.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Sharon is unhappy that Mandy destroyed her family and confronts her to mock her for being the same as before, condoning her husband's affair to prevent losing her status as Mrs. Xie. Mandy advises Sharon to come to her senses, telling her truthfully that she has already understood these actions as a form of illusion and self-comfort. Dong Yu's heart breaks upon hearing these words.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Fuk Wor Triad member Ting and Senior Inspector Tuen of the Regional Anti Triad Unit are moles that have been planted by the rival party. After years undercover, both are eager to start new lives.

programme.title: Boiling Pot
programme.desc: Noelle learns to make Rolling Donkey, a royal dessert, from Chef Tian at Bistro Na's, the only Chinese restaurant in LA to receive a Michilin star in 2019.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: On his way up north, Wang Lin is attacked by two assassins. Although he evades him this time, the Queen Mother has ordered for him to be killed within a month.
